channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description:
Just need to know how to make a safe zone because i wat to make an area that my mods+ can go to.
I used to know how to do this but i gave up on making my server but now im back and would like to please.
If there is already a tut on this could you please link it to me or could you just please tell me.
Thanks for reading Tom

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @soi_spoon soi spoon
item.description:
@soi_spoon wrote:

So you want to make a safe zone? Let me guess the base Project Czar or Alstar? Because, the ridiculous creators decided it would be easier to declare where it is safe then where it is wild.

Its for a server i dwnloaded, just wanna know so i can make new areaâ€™s
